Posts.Content: Jun 22, 2009 06:42AM christa0329 wrote: I was 29 dx stage 2 and 33 stage IV mets to pelvis (about a month ago)
Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2010 12:00AM christa0329 wrote: I am 34, was first diagnosed at age 29 with stage 2, had chemo, lost my hair, had radiation, started on tamoxifen and thought all was fine.  At 33 I was diagnosed with reoccurrance they found a spot on my pelvis now stage 4, started taking Arimidex, a year later, progression to bones, and liver now on Zometa every six weeks and Xeloda.  Been married for 5 years, hoping for many more. christa
Posts.Title: ANYONE ELSE IN THEIR 20'S? texasrose361 EnglishMajor

Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2010 08:18AM christa0329 wrote: Hope your birthday was wonderful.  I was diagnosed when I was 29 ( a birthday I so dreaded), and my 30th birthday happened to fall on a chemo day.  Now I'm 34, been stage IV for almost two years.  I've been on Xeloda since August, minimal side effects, tired mostly dry hands and feet, it seems to be working, lowered TM and regression on my latest scans.  I am looking forward to 35 and beyond!!
Posts.Title: It is my 30th b'day tomorrow HopeToMakeIt HopeToMakeIt
